actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to authorize the Department of Veterans Affairs to appoint, without regard to civil service hiring procedures, graduates in certain health-care professions or occupations trained by the Department.

summary.text: Authorizes the appointment of Department of Veterans Affairs-trained graduates in certain health-care professions or occupations by the Department without regard to civil service competitive examining procedures.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to authorize the Department of Veterans Affairs to appoint, without regard to civil service hiring procedures, graduates in certain health-care professions or occupations trained by the Department.
